title: Define System Architecture
description: Develop a high-level architecture for the BCI system that translates thought patterns into written text.

title: Design BCI Interface
description: Create a user interface design for the BCI system to capture thought patterns from the user.

title: Develop BCI Algorithm
description: Create the algorithm that will interpret thought patterns and translate them into text.

title: Develop Text Generation Module
description: Create a module that will convert the interpreted thought patterns into written text.

title: Integrate System Components
description: Combine the developed components into a functional system.

title: Test System Functionality
description: Perform extensive testing on the system to ensure it functions correctly.

title: Review System Design
description: Review the system design and architecture for potential improvements.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create technical documentation for the system to guide developers and users.
